posts.post_content:
Looking to purchase a nice Ex or better creaseless John Henry T207.

Please send scans and asking price. Will pay strong for nice example!


Thanks,


Patrick

posts.post_title: Now that's a fine kettle o'fish!
posts.post_content:
[quote name="Vintagecatcher" post=1385398]Looking to purchase a nice Ex or better creaseless John Henry T207.

Please send scans and asking price. Will pay strong for nice example!

Thanks,

Patrick[/QUOTE]

Good luck with your quest, Patrick!

At some point in late 2014, for T207 PSA had only 2 examples of Henry at Ex or better ... SGC had only 3.  Tough card in that grade.  

No doubt they're out there in folks collections, they simply don't surface all that often.

--
Mike

Thanks Mike,

Getting close to finishing my run of T207 catchers I'm interested in acquiring.

If any one has a Grover Cleveland Hartley or William Kelly Cycle back T207, I still need a Cycle back for my type collection.
Any other catchers with that back in the T207 set?

Thanks,

Patrick

Hey Patrick

Looks like there are 6 catchers in T207 that are available with the Cycle back:

Adams, Hartley, Kelly, Kuhn, I. Lewis, and O. Miller


Would help you with one of those in Cycle if I could ... even getting those 6 with any back is a challenge!  

--
Mike

Thanks for the information Mike!


Patrick
